segments.text: How are you getting along with your paper ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't finished it . It is very difficult .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should hand it in before next Sunday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I know . I will try my best .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe you can do a good job .
segments.speaker: S1
